laboratory_examinations.findings: Cortisol was undetectable on several occasions; complete cortisol deficiency confirmed later.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Cortisol concentrations were low during hypoglycemic episodes and undeclared before hydrocortisone treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Very low IGF-I level of 38 ng/ml at age 5 yr in one patient.
Low levels of IgG, IgA, and IgM, which were below normal ranges.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: One patient developed slightly decreased levels of IgG, IgA, and IgM after five years.
